title: Romantic Declaration
content:
My dearest [NAME],

Every moment with you feels like a dream I never want to wake up from. Your smile lights up my world, and your touch sends shivers down my spine. I never believed in soulmates until I met you.

[PERSONAL MESSAGE]

Forever yours,
[YOUR NAME]

title: Deep Affection
content:
My beloved [NAME],

Words seem inadequate to express the depth of my feelings for you. Each day with you brings new joys and deeper appreciation for the miracle of finding you.

[PERSONAL MESSAGE]

With all my heart,
[YOUR NAME]
